vacation spots.Fun fact: 1 of the 7 new nature wonders of the World!
vacation spots.Reason to visit: Table Mountain is a flat-topped/plateau mountain and is the most iconic landmark of South Africa. For more information visit https://tablemountainnationalpark.org/

vacation spots.Fun fact: The Cape of Good Hope is NOT the southern tip of Africa!
vacation spots.Reason to visit: One historical account says that Dias named the promontory Cape of Storms and that John II of Portugal renamed it Cape of Good Hope (because its discovery was a good omen that India could be reached by sea from Europe); other sources attribute its present name to Dias himsel - source Britannica.

vacation spots.Fun fact: Declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1999, the site is home to the largest concentration of human ancestral remains anywhere in the world. - source : Wikidepida
vacation spots.Reason to visit: It has Homo naledi exhibition and Sterkfontein Caves. The Cradle of Humankind is one of the world's most important fossil sites because it has produced: The first adult Australopithecus, found by Dr Robert Broom at Sterkfontein in 1936.

vacation spots.Fun fact: It is is one of the world's highest commercial bungy jumping sites at 216 metres (709 ft) above the Bloukrans River. - source : Wikipedia
vacation spots.Reason to visit: Do it for the aderline rush!

vacation spots.Area: Garden Route National Park, Southern South Africa
vacation spots.Fun fact: It is is one of the world's most beautiful national parks where one can hike, kayak and perform ither adventure sports.
vacation spots.Reason to visit: Visit the Suspension Bridge for pristine views of African floral and fauna
